channel.title: HTML – Xây dựng website thương mại điện tử

item.title: Incorrect Zip
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Hey, I downloaded the ZIP, which I’ve attached to this ticket, and it appears to be the WordPress version and not the HTML5 version. Are you able to send me the HTML5 version? I suspect the wrong download as been attached to the listing so you may wish to adjust that too. Thank you, James
item.content:encoded:
Hey,

I downloaded the ZIP, which I’ve attached to this ticket, and it appears to be the WordPress version and not the HTML5 version. Are you able to send me the HTML5 version? I suspect the wrong download as been attached to the listing so you may wish to adjust that too.

Thank you,

James

item.title: How compile SCSS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Hello, We try to use the SCSS files, have you some script o package.json config to compile the scss files? Thanks
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

We try to use the SCSS files, have you some script o package.json config to compile the scss files?

Thanks

item.title: How rewrite bootstrap colors
